thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com | 42 4
thread.title: Fernando

author: Fernando
title: Fernando
text:
A month ago I bought a SJCAM 5000X camera and I had my reticence because it was the first time I bought in this web. But the payment was fast, I was more economical than I thought. I got the item quickly, with tracking number.
The product of very good quality even in low light, can be programmed the operation from the mobile. The only drawback is the duration of the battery that lasts a little.
Thank you very much.
